lead_paragraph: After her prostitute mother is brutally murdered in her sleep, teenager Ellie Masters is sent to an orphanage run by Mrs. Deere. Sadly for Ellie, the isolated institution is more of a concentration camp than an orphanage and her mother's killer appears to be stalking her. Ellie's social worker is under Mrs. Deere's control and shows no interest in her welfare, but fortunately, detective Calvin Carruthers is very interested in her case.
